page.title: 16The Strand, Gillingham
page.content: "Lets all go down the Strand". This is a line made famous in an old song. People and children in Gillingham love going to the Strand because there are lots of things to do. The activities don't cost much and the park and the paddling pool are free. These are the activities you can enjoy; in the park you can swim, ride on the miniature railway, play crazy golf and proper golf, cruise in paddle boats, play tennis. There is also a playground with swings and slides. Some people just like to sunbathe, or paddle in the river Medway. Whatever you choose to do, The Strand is a very attractive place.
